name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A town in Israel is building an amusement park that some are calling "the Jewish Disneyland." The Jewish Disneyland still has Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, except Doc is the chief of cardiology at Cedars-Sinai.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The porn star that claims she had an affair with the president is now suing him. Man, it's so weird – it's almost as if we DID elect a Clinton!

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Snapchat is laying off 100 employees. A spokesperson for the company said, "It's weird, it's like they were here a second ago and they just disappeared."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Nickelodeon is bringing back the popular preschoolers' TV show "Blue's Clues." There's one slight change – Blue only solves triple homicides.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The new Florida weapons bill would allow librarians to arm themselves. Now, in a related story, talking in Florida libraries is down 99 percent.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: It's been reported that Britain's Queen Elizabeth has made over $9 million betting on horse racing. When asked to comment, Queen Elizabeth said, "That's nothing! I've won $20 million on dog fighting."
